text: A man with straws had two lovers, one young and one old. The older woman, ashamed of dealing with a younger man, would not let her black hair fall off when she came to be next to her. The younger, trying to hide that she had an old lover, ripped off her whites. And so, shaved by the turn of the day by the hands of one and the other, he became bald. In this way, what is missing is harmful. FIN
title: El entrecano y las dos prostitutas
author: nan Esopo
